item.title: Install HandWriter
item.description: HandWriter can be installed on Windows and MacOS using installers: Windows installer MacOS installer Installing on Linux An installation script has been provided that takes care of everything for you. Alternatively, you can install HandWriter manually as explained below. Installing using the install script curl https://github.com/GDGVIT/HandWriter/raw/master/install.sh -o ~/handwriter-installer.sh -L chmod a+x ~/handwriter-installer.sh ~/handwriter-installer.sh You can remove the script once you’re done rm ~/handwriter-installer.sh Installing manually Fedora To manage HandWriter with Fedora’s (or CentOS’) package manager -
